column2: Improve how you manage your project?
column3: Improve the usability of your software?
column4: Improve the maintainability of your software?
column6: Make it easier to share your software with others?
column7: Improve the longer-term future of your software?
column8: Improve the reproducibility of your (or stakeholders') research results?
column9: Improve the correctness of your research results?
column10: Reduce the time taken to obtain research results?
column11: Increase the scale of research you (or stakeholders) can do?
column12: Improve the relationship with your software community? e.g. users, developers
